OK, here's the thing:

  1. The logging default is set during tf.logging initialization
  2. You can't set the logging without triggering tensorflow/__init__.py, which will trigger registering all gradients.

I don't see any way to change this short of changing the code. One last ditch effort would be to try and set sys.flags.interactive = False but it's probably already there.

Sorry, I'm going to close this issue because I don't think it's feasible for us to fix this reasonably well. Feel free to open a new feature request or re-open if you feel strongly about that.

body:
OK, here's the thing:

1. The logging default is set during `tf.logging` [initialization](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/default/_tf_logging.py#L55)
2. You can't set the logging without triggering `tensorflow/__init__.py`, which will trigger registering all gradients.

I don't see any way to change this short of changing the code. One last ditch effort would be to try and set `sys.flags.interactive = False` but it's probably already there.

Sorry, I'm going to close this issue because I don't think it's feasible for us to fix this reasonably well. Feel free to open a new feature request or re-open if you feel strongly about that.
